issue.title: DRCSIM: VRC1: Parking brake not on: car rolls when the robot tries to get in.

content.raw:
The parking brake is enabled in VRC task 1. When I launch vrc task 1 and put the gas pedal on 100% the vehicle doesn't move.

Are you spawning the vehicle in a separate world? If so then you might be using the vehicle without the plugin loaded.
content.html:
The parking brake is enabled in VRC task 1. When I launch vrc task 1 and put the gas pedal on 100% the vehicle doesn't move.

Are you spawning the vehicle in a separate world? If so then you might be using the vehicle without the plugin loaded.
